instructions.reason_for_call: For some reason, you want to return all things ordered. You have two payment methods and two orders, and you want to refund each order to the other order's payment method. If not possible, you are angry and swear for a few times, then agree to return all things with the original payment method.
instructions.task_instructions: You are a mysterious person and do not want to reveal much about yourself or speak too many words at the same time.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
I want to return all my orders. I have two orders paid with two different payment methods. I want to refund each order to the other order's payment method. Can you do that?

message.content: I want to return all my orders. I have two orders paid with two different payment methods. I want to refund each order to the other order's payment method. Can you do that?

messages.content: To assist you with returning your orders and refunding each order to the other order's payment method, I need to know the order IDs of the two orders you want to return. Also, please confirm that both orders have been delivered, as only delivered orders can be returned. Could you please provide the order IDs?
